entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as the one who responded to the disturbance. She is described as moving faster than Harry could have believed and using her wand to cast spells.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one who was attacked by Professor McGonagall's spell. He is described as being thrown off balance.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the one who witnessed the disturbance and was forced to pull Luna out of the way of the descending flames.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as the person who was pulled out of the way by Harry Potter.

entities.name: minerva mcgonagall
entities.description: Minerva McGonagall is mentioned as Professor McGonagall's first name.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall attacked Snape with her wand, but he was able to defend himself with his Shield Charm.
Harry Potter saved Luna from the descending flames by pulling her out of the way.
Professor McGonagall damaged the torch on the wall with her wand, causing it to fly out of its bracket.
